query:
ALTER TABLE billing_records 
ADD COLUMN waypointId INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER routeId,
ADD COLUMN contactId INT AFTER routeHolderId,
ADD COLUMN contactName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' AFTER contactId,
ADD COLUMN visitType VARCHAR(100) AFTER contactName,
CHANGE COLUMN routeDate visitDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
MODIFY COLUMN billingModel ENUM('mileage','flat_fee','hourly','per_visit') NOT NULL,
CHANGE COLUMN totalHours totalMinutes INT,
ADD COLUMN perVisitAmount INT AFTER flatFeeAmount;
